description: In this first episode of Stranded, blue-eyed Jack Hunter and muscular hunk Damien Stone are paired up together to spend 7 nights in the wilderness alone and naked! A snake bites Damien, but there is no medic in sight so it is up to the producer, dark-haired beau, Bruce Beckham to help him. He sucks the poison out of his leg which causes Damien’s uncut cock to harden. The chiseled stud moves from his leg and starts sucking his dick leading them to a wild, outdoor romp. Will they be able to survive the wilderness?
title: Stranded Part 1
